actions.description: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage.
actions.name: Unarmed Strike

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 52 (8d12) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or move 1 round forward in time. A target moved forward in time vanishes for the duration. When the effect ends, the target reappears in the space it left or in an unoccupied space nearest to that space if it's occupied.
actions.name: Temporal Strike (Recharge 6)

actions.description:
The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)

3/day each: see invisibility

1/day each: plane shift, teleport
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)

specialTraits.description: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.
specialTraits.name: Psychic Defense
